    • loadClipPlane

      public void loadClipPlane​(org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector4f plane)
      Method that loads up the clipping plane.
      Parameters:
      plane - Vector4f, this is the plane where you want to start the clipping.

    • loadNumberOfRows

      public void loadNumberOfRows​(int numberOfRows)
      Method that loads up the number of rows
      Parameters:
      numberOfRows - int, this is the number of rows you want to load up.

    • loadOffset

      public void loadOffset​(float x, float y)
      Method that loads up the Offset
      Parameters:
      x - float, the x coordinate of the offset loads this into a new Vector2f.
      y - float, the y coordinate of the offset loads this into a new Vector2f.

    • loadSkyColour

      public void loadSkyColour​(float r, float g, float b)
      Method that loads up the colour of the Sky
      Parameters:
      r - float, value that represents the red colour.
      g - float, value that represents the green colour.
      b - float, value that represents the blue colour.

    • loadFakeLightingVariable

      public void loadFakeLightingVariable​(boolean useFake)
      Method that loads up fake lighting
      Parameters:
      useFake - boolean, true if you want to load up fake lighting.

    • loadShineVariables

      public void loadShineVariables​(float damper, float reflectivity)
      Method that loads up the shine
      Parameters:
      damper - float, value that represents the inhibition of the shine.
      reflectivity - float, value that represents the reflectivity of the shine.

    • loadTransformationMatrix

      public void loadTransformationMatrix​(org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f matrix)
      method that loads the transformation Matrix
      Parameters:
      matrix - Matrix4f, this is the matrix that represents transformations.

    • loadViewMatrix

      public void loadViewMatrix​(Camera camera)
      Method that loads the viewMatrix
      Parameters:
      camera - Camera, assigns the camera as the viewMatrix and loads it up.

    • loadLights

      public void loadLights​(java.util.List<Light> lights)
      Loads in a list of lights for the shaders.
      Parameters:
      lights - List, a list of all the light sources in the game.

    • loadProjectionMatrix

      public void loadProjectionMatrix​(org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f projection)
      Method that loads up the projection Matrix
      Parameters:
      projection - Matrix4f, this is a matrix containing the projection.
